# [Interview #977: Cosmere Q&A - 17th Shard, Entry #97](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=977#97)

#### McCullough

Having to do with Legion, if you could take a picture of any historical event what would it be?

#### Brandon Sanderson
